item.title: AccorHotels has launched its 200th property in Greater China, located in Chengdu
item.description: Source: AccorHotels. The Fairmont Chengdu lobby. The Fairmont Chengdu marks the 200th property for AccorHotels in Greater China and is the first Fairmont Hotels & Resorts establishment in Western China. This opening is a key part of AccorHotelsâ€™ expansion within the luxury market. Situated on Tianfu Middle Avenue in Chengdu’s high-tech zone, the hotel provides 336 guest rooms and suites, each offering impressive views of the city skyline. Shuangliu International Airport is easily accessible at just a 25-minute drive away, and the nearby metro station provides convenient access to Tianfu Square, the forthcoming Tianfu International Airport, and the South CBD zone.
